Hi,
I would like to have some help with this set of fittings. They are 
fitted on a Shinto wakizashi signed Bizen no Kami Sukekuni. 
Unfortunately no one is signed.  I would like to have opinions regarding 
school, style, technique, design and value. Please help me.

http://hem.bredband.net/odrike/Tosogu1.htm
You can press the images for larger pictures.
Thank you,
Fredrik
